name: Lamborghini American Challenge
description:
Lamborghini American Challenge is a racing game developed by Titus Software and Titus Interactive. It came out on 01-01-1993. Titus Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Lamborghini American Challenge on Commodore / Amiga, Atari ST, Game Boy and SNES.
Frederic Prados, Richard Hooper and Thorsten Mitschele scored the game.
